blocks.content: Android-Inspired Design for a Special Day.

For my wedding party, I created a mobile-friendly website that mimics the look and feel of an Android ListView — a nod to my love for mobile UI design. Built with jQuery UI and the Google Maps API, the site offered guests a sleek itinerary, venue details, and interactive maps to help everyone stay on track and in the loop.

The design was intentionally minimal and familiar, making it easy for guests to navigate on their phones without needing to download anything. It was a fun blend of personal creativity and practical utility — and a great excuse to sneak some tech into the celebration.
